definition: to change one's reservation/to transfer to a different flight, airline, bus or train
to sign one's name/visa/variant of 籤|签[qian1]
inscribed bamboo stick (used in divination, gambling, drawing lots etc)/small wood sliver/label/tag

sentences.english: Could I change a later flight on which dinner is served ?
sentences.chinese: 我能改签到一个提供晚餐的航班上吗？

sentences.english: I'm sorry , your ticket can't be changed, only to be refunded.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，您的车票不能办理改签，只能退票。

sentences.english: Sure. What time do you want to change to?
sentences.chinese: 你们想改签到什么时候？

sentences.english: We will endorse the latest flight for you.
sentences.chinese: 我们将为您改签最近的航班。

sentences.english: Unlike with most flights, changing your shuttle flight is free of charge.
sentences.chinese: 与其它航线不同，穿梭航班的机票改签是不收费的。

sentences.english: We can endorse the flight from Haikou to Guangzhou for you.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以为您改签海口至广州的航班。

sentences.english: I want to change my flight reservation.
I would like to change my reservation.
The ticket can be signed only once.

definition: to bounce (a check)/to return a ticket/ticket refund
to buy or upgrade a ticket after boarding a train, boat etc/to buy a ticket for a show after having sat down in the theater
to buy tickets/(Tw) to buy votes (in an election)
scheduled flight/flight number/plane/scheduled sailing/sailing number/passenger ship
